snippet: Michelle Obama was among those at the funeral of Hadiya Pendleton, who performed at President Obama’s inauguration, and whose death has come to represent the cost of gun and gang violence.
abstract: Michelle Obama is among those at the Chicago funeral of 15-year-old Hadiya Pendleton, who performed at President Obama’s inauguration, and whose shooting death in the South Side has come to represent the cost of gun and gang violence.

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and STEVEN YACCINO
byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington, and Catrin Einhorn from New York.

lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama was among those at the funeral of Hadiya Pendleton, who performed at President Obama’s inauguration, and whose death has come to represent the cost of gun and gang violence.

headline.seo: Washington Officials Among Those Mourning Hadiya Pendleton of Chicago
headline.main: Washington Officials Join in Mourning a Young Shooting Victim in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Washington Officials Join in Mourning a Young Shooting Victim in Chicago
